com.sonic.as_storage_java
Class Device

java.lang.Object
  com.sonic.as_storage_java.Device

public class Device
extends java.lang.Object

This class manages all of the device related functions.

Author:
vijaya_lashkari

Method Detail

GetAppInUse

public java.lang.String GetAppInUse()

SetDeviceXMLPath

public void SetDeviceXMLPath(java.lang.String path)
Public method to set xml path for device operations

OpenDevice

public int OpenDevice(int index,
                      java.lang.String path)
Opens a given device and is used to specify the device in subsequent device-related calls. The device selection is specified with the parameter index or a file's path.

Parameters:
index - the index of the OS provided drive-index.
path - a path to a file used as a device
Returns:
StorageError.None - ok,
StorageError.InvalidIndex - if the index provided is greater than the count provided,
StorageError.Fatal - failed to create a list of valid drives.
NOTE: This function must be called before any other device-related calls.
The value of index must be less than or equal to the count output by GetDeviceCount.
The optional parameter path should be specified as "" unless the device reference is being obtained for a file, in which case index will be ignored and the device will actually represent the file at the given path.
